description: In honor of summer, we are introducing the Cucumber Elderflower cocktail. This invigorating drink is perfect for hot weather and features&nbsp;gin, cucumbers, elderflower liqueur, lime juice, and Bianco vermouth.It's surprisingly healthy and delicious! Try it at your&nbsp;next party or gathering and see for yourself. Cheers!
name: Cucumber Elderflower

recipeInstructions.name: Slice your cucumber into quarters, and add them along with the gin, elderflower liqueur, vermouth, and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker.
recipeInstructions.text: Slice your cucumber into quarters, and add them along with the gin, elderflower liqueur, vermouth, and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker.

recipeInstructions.name: Add the egg white and ice and shake until it's frothy.
recipeInstructions.text: Add the egg white and ice and shake until it's frothy.

recipeInstructions.name: Double strain into a coup glass and let it settle.
recipeInstructions.text: Double strain into a coup glass and let it settle.

recipeInstructions.name: Zest lemon and cucumber on top for garnish.
recipeInstructions.text: Zest lemon and cucumber on top for garnish.
